name: Hunter Street
overview: Sleuthy foster siblings Max, Tess, Sal, Anika, and Daniel Hunter find new quests, more mysteries, and even new Hunter sibs!

episodes.name: The New Hunter
episodes.overview: Max wakes up in his new foster home to discover his foster parents have vanished. Max and his new brothers and sisters embark on an adventure to find them.

episodes.name: Saganash
episodes.overview: The Hunters stay home from school to search for their missing parents and find more than they were expecting in the Hunter House Library. Anika leads a museum tour.

episodes.name: The Secret Room
episodes.overview: The Hunters discover a secret room in the house. A clue sends Tess on the trail of a mysterious figure.

episodes.name: Principal
episodes.overview: When Max gets into trouble at school, the headmistress decides she must speak with his foster parents.The kids scramble to distract her from their absence.

episodes.name: Rinus
episodes.overview: Max & Tess track the mysterious Rinus through Amsterdam and discover a cryptic notebook. Back at the Hunter house the other kids make a mess while trying to cheer themselves up.

episodes.name: The Key
episodes.overview: Max and Tess follow a clue to an Amsterdam cemetery where they uncover an old family secret and unknown key. Meanwhile, Anika has suspicions about the new cleaning lady.

episodes.name: The Blue Diamond
episodes.overview: The Hunter kids put on a diamond exhibition to lure their nemesis out of hiding.

episodes.name: MGP
episodes.overview: A mysterious message helps the Hunter kids track down the elusive 'Magpie' but it may be too late as others suspect the kids are home alone.

episodes.name: Aunt Hedwig & Uncle Eugene
episodes.overview: Distant relatives Aunt Hedwig and Uncle Eugene are brought in to look after the Hunter children. The kids worry their relatives are more interested in the Hunter fortune than helping the family.

episodes.name: Contact
episodes.overview: The Hunters attempt a high stakes exchange to rescue their parents while working to outwit Aunt Hedwig and Uncle Eugene.

episodes.name: The Relatives
episodes.overview: A new foster couple temporarily takes in Anika and Sal while Max and Tess uncover news about the blue diamond.

episodes.name: The Red Diamond
episodes.overview: The kids begin to unravel the mystery around the missing red diamond. Max keeps a secret from his siblings.

episodes.name: Cassandra's Map
episodes.overview: When the discovery of an old map points the kids' towards the red diamond, Max makes a secret deal with a nemesis.

episodes.name: Anika's Birthday
episodes.overview: Tess and Max work together to trick their foes. Anika doesn't want to celebrate her birthday.

episodes.name: The Maze
episodes.overview: Tess journeys into a maze of underground tunnels to find the red diamond. Max has to conquer his fears. The Hunters get a surprise visit. Max and Tess meet with the hooded figure.

episodes.name: Undercover
episodes.overview: Max tracks a possible suspect while the other kids search the house for new clues. Anika takes on an unlikely mission.

episodes.name: Sophie
episodes.overview: The Hunter kids capture a surprising trespasser and must hide their new guest from Tim and Simone.

episodes.name: Bruhl
episodes.overview: The Hunter kids must band together to outwit one of their biggest opponents.

episodes.name: Almost Back
episodes.overview: The Hunters make a huge breakthrough but also suffer a big setback as they get closer to their ultimate goal.

episodes.name: The Deed
episodes.overview: The final villain is revealed as the kids race to solve the last clues and unlock the mystery.

episodes.name: The Package
episodes.overview: The Hunters discover a cryptex, but Erik secretly takes it before they can find out what's inside. Max hears from his birth parents. And the police accuse Eric of art theft.

episodes.name: The Arrest
episodes.overview: Erik is taken to the police station, where Daniel tries to find the evidence against him. Max talks to his birth parents.The police arrive to search the house.

episodes.name: Max
episodes.overview: The kids find the stolen puzzle box and try to hide it from the police. Erik returns home but is acting suspicious. Daniel finds a clue in the museum footage. After tough goodbyes, Max leaves for Spain.

episodes.name: Evie
episodes.overview: The Hunters meet a young girl named Evie – and her necklace has the same crown symbol they discovered in the cryptex! And Erik reveals that he has a special connection to Evie.

episodes.name: The Museum
episodes.overview: The kids find evidence that could prove Erik's innocence. But someone hacks into Sal's computer and erases the footage! And Max realizes there is something strange about how his birth parents tracked him down.

episodes.name: The New Friend
episodes.overview: Evie's stepmom, Lucia, tries to take her back.The Hunters try to track down info on Lucia and visit Evie's old neighborhood, where they meet tech-loving, Jennie. She provides footage that gives them their next clue.

episodes.name: The Family Tree
episodes.overview: Tess finds an old Ruybosch family tree and realizes it's marked with the same crown symbol. Jenny helps Sal investigate his hacker. And a comic book publisher approaches Jake with an interesting offer.

episodes.name: Payback
episodes.overview: The kids think Lucia framed Erik and decide to frame her back by planting a vase in her house. But the plan goes awry and they must work to avoid getting caught.

episodes.name: The Plan
episodes.overview: To save Erik from deeper trouble, the kids must get the vase out of Lucia's house before the police discover it. While Evie has her first day at school, the other kids come up with a plan to retrieve the hidden vase.

episodes.name: The Reverse Heist
episodes.overview: The reverse heist is on, but the plan involves many risky elements. Will the Hunter kids make it out of Lucia's house with the vase before being caught?

episodes.name: The Mole
episodes.overview: The Hunter kids realize one of the Relatives is a mole and devise a plan to uncover him/her. And Daniel can no longer work on the case now that they police have enough evidence to prosecute Erik.

episodes.name: The Green Mask
episodes.overview: Is Daniel working with the enemy? The Hunter kids confront him and he reveals a new piece of evidence. Each of the kids does their part to find the spy, but it is Anika who unwittingly uncovers the next piece of the puzzle.

episodes.name: Hacker Hideout
episodes.overview: The Hunters approach Detective Simon with their evidence, but are dismissed. Back at the house Apoll0 appears with news that he can find the hacker. A daring mission ensues and leads the kids to an abandoned railway yard.

episodes.name: The Super Secret Room
episodes.overview: Inside the hacker hideout they discover a map to a hidden room in the Hunter house! When the kids return home to find it, Max contacts them through the telegraph machine with one word - DANGER!

episodes.name: The Crown
episodes.overview: Apollo reveals the hacker's identity and plan; Anika and Jake attempt to contact Max. The Hunters confront the thief, but he escapes and locks them in the secret room.

episodes.name: Hide and Seek
episodes.overview: Sal and Jennie discover the hacker's identity; Evie finds a mysterious object while searching for the crown.

episodes.name: The Houseboat
episodes.overview: Lucia makes another claim for Evie. Tess recognizes the object Evie found and thinks it will lead them to the true identity of the mole.

episodes.name: Spy
episodes.overview: Tess and Sal work on discovering the mole's identity. Daniel and Anika spy on Lucia; the hacker learns he has been tricked.

episodes.name: The Ritual
episodes.overview: Diane shows up and takes the crown when Erik is forced to go to the police station. The children finally uncover the mole's true identity.

episodes.name: Hunters Forever
episodes.overview: Tess and Jake desperately try to convince relatives that the mole has framed Erik, but Sal's evidence is needed to prove Erik's innocence and stop the thieves from escaping with the crown.

episodes.name: The Birthday Gift
episodes.overview: Anika is sent an unusual birthday present – a miniature pyramid wrapped inside a torn treasure map. Sal discovers they are tied to a long-lost Aztec treasure – and an ancient curse. A new mystery has begun!

episodes.name: Strange House
episodes.overview: The Hunters set off for a family vacation, but all is not as it seems when their directions lead them to an abandoned house in the forest. Things get even stranger when they hear noises in the attic…

episodes.name: The Storm
episodes.overview: When the Hunters car won't start, they’re stuck at the forest house as a storm approaches. Sal, Anika and Jake tell spooky stories to pass the time, but are shocked when one of the stories starts to come true!

episodes.name: Jake's Curse
episodes.overview: When Jake tries on an ancient mask from the attic, the owner of the forest house is convinced he is now cursed. And after Jake suffers a series of mishaps, it seems like the curse might be real!

episodes.name: Lost in the Woods
episodes.overview: Sal and Anika discover a mysterious stone near the house. Determined to find out more, they head into the forest in search of clues…only to realize they are not alone.

episodes.name: Oliver
episodes.overview: Sal and Anika meet a nervous boy in the forest. While Anika befriends him, Sal is convinced he is a thief. But when the two of them confront him, he reveals a secret they never would have expected.

episodes.name: The Code
episodes.overview: With Oliver’s help, Sal builds a phone mast and is finally able to decipher the symbols on the pyramid. Meanwhile, Anika quizzes Dottie about the artifacts in the attic, but has a tough time getting answers.

episodes.name: Remedies and Riddles
episodes.overview: Anika and Oliver attempt to make a potion to cure Jake’s curse. Meanwhile, Sal struggles to solve the first riddle – but Evie may have the answer.

episodes.name: Curse or Cure?
episodes.overview: Having figured out the workings of the mysterious map, the gang splits up in search of another riddle stone – but who will get there first? And who will get a fright in the forest?

episodes.name: The Second Stone
episodes.overview: The gang uncovers a second riddle, but cracking it proves tricky. And when an emergency means the Hunter kids must return to the city immediately, it looks like the treasure hunt is off for good.

episodes.name: Return to Hunter Street
episodes.overview: Sal and Anika pay a visit to Diane, where they spot a familiar - and frightening - face at her door. Meanwhile, in the forest, Oliver and Jasmyn try to solve the riddle on their own.

episodes.name: Mr. Bear
episodes.overview: With the Hunter Museum's survival at stake, Sal and Anika devise a secret plan to retrieve their stolen artifacts and save their home. And two new arrivals turn up at their house, but are they friends or foes?

episodes.name: Rex to the Rescue
episodes.overview: Anika and Sal have a narrow escape after realizing they've been tricked. Oliver must hide in plain sight at the Hunter House while Jasmyn is forced to cover for him at home, causing chaos all around!

episodes.name: Secret Signs
episodes.overview: Jasmyn makes a discovery in the forest, but can't figure out how it connects to the treasure hunt. Jake is finally coming home from the hospital, but it wouldn't be a Hunter welcome without a big surprise.

episodes.name: Evil Narikoa
episodes.overview: Jasmyn encounters a problem during her search for the next riddle stone. Anika and Oliver spot the mysterious Markus coming out of the planetarium. Sal and Jake uncover a shocking secret that will change everything!

episodes.name: Siblings
episodes.overview: Anika and Oliver argue after he shares an upsetting theory with her. Meanwhile, Sal and Jasmyn must attempt a daring and dangerous mission in order to find the next riddle stone.

episodes.name: What Hides Beneath
episodes.overview: It's a day of discoveries for the gang – Jasmyn finds a new clue but gets caught red-handed. Oliver stumbles upon a secret in the Hunter House. And Sal and Anika get a surprise when they revisit Diane's house.

episodes.name: The Butterfly Sun
episodes.overview: With another stone found and a new riddle to solve, the gang returns to the planetarium in search of answers, but get more than they were expecting. Will they be able to solve the mystery in time?

episodes.name: Appeals
episodes.overview: Anika returns to the forest looking for answers, but comes across a shocking scene. The Hunters are doing everything they can to find their stolen artifacts. But will it be enough to save the museum and their home?

episodes.name: Trapped
episodes.overview: Anika decides to confront Dottie, but her plan goes more than a little awry. Sal and Oliver develop an old camera film and discover an unexpected truth.

episodes.name: Escape
episodes.overview: Anika and Jasmyn escape from the attic, but not before gathering vital new clues. Sal and Oliver search for the next riddle stone, but they aren't the only ones looking for it. Who will get there first?

episodes.name: Moms
episodes.overview: Anika's detective work leads her to uncover the truth about her past. Back in the forest, the boys are hot on the trail of the next riddle but find themselves getting stuck!

episodes.name: Swamped
episodes.overview: Anika starts to put the pieces together and tries to warn Sal that he could be in danger. But it might be too late as the boys have already gotten themselves into a sticky situation.

episodes.name: Truth and Lies
episodes.overview: Everyone reunites in the forest and Oliver finally learns the truth about Dottie. The kids formulate a new plan to find the treasure and save the Hunter Museum.

episodes.name: The Final Riddle?
episodes.overview: The race is on as Sal and Jasmyn try to solve the final riddle before their mystery opponent. And Anika and Oliver try everything and anything to get valuable information at the forest house.

episodes.name: Revelations
episodes.overview: Sal and Anika return to the Hunter House to work with Rex on the mystery. And Oliver and Jasmyn finally uncover the identity of their secret enemy!

episodes.name: Not Quite X Marks the Spot
episodes.overview: Sal and Anika are left empty-handed after another shocking robbery and now must find a different way to outwit their enemy. Back in the forest, Oliver decides to take matters into his own hands.

episodes.name: Tricky Times
episodes.overview: With the eclipse rapidly approaching and the final riddle solved, the kids must put their heads together and figure out how to stop their enemy and get to the treasure first.

episodes.name: The Pyramid
episodes.overview: With only hours left until the eclipse finally happens, every second is vital. But with Sal and Anika trapped at the Hunter house, will they make it to the secret location in time?

episodes.name: Eclipse
episodes.overview: The eclipse has finally arrived -can the Hunters beat their enemy to the treasure while also saving the Hunter Museum?

episodes.name: An Unexpected Guest
episodes.overview: Oliver and Anika have a new mystery - figuring out who their real dad is! An unexpected guest and an invitation to summer school sends them in a different direction.

episodes.name: Babies, Bunnies and Beards
episodes.overview: Determined to find out what's inside the toy bunny, Anika decides to accompany Jennie to the summer school, leaving Oliver to search potential dad suspects.

episodes.name: Sally Hunter
episodes.overview: Oliver, Jasmyn and Evie head to a book signing hoping for some bio-dad names. Meanwhile 'Sally' has a difficult initiation test by Miss Lucas, putting her cover under strain.

episodes.name: Quantum Problems and Dead Ends
episodes.overview: Jennie and Anika hit a dead end with their investigation into the bunny's holocode device, while the hunt for the twins' dad reveals a new name.

episodes.name: House Arrest
episodes.overview: The Hunters struggle to free themselves from the lockdown created by Erik's security system via a series of riddles in their very own Hunter Street Escape Room adventure.

episodes.name: The Intruder
episodes.overview: Evie struggles to convince the others there's someone else in the house, and with Erik and Kate departing, the Hunter kids are alone with a threat lurking in their midst.

episodes.name: Mind Games
episodes.overview: Anika and Jennie try to get to the bottom of the mysterious VR headsets. Oliver, Florian and Jasmyn are in for a shock of their own when they pay a visit to Florian's house.

episodes.name: Break-in
episodes.overview: The Hunters plan a break-in at the Academy. While Anika, Jasmyn and Jennie get their spy on, the boys are set to work trying to find a potential code word to unlock the holocode.

episodes.name: Relatively Speaking
episodes.overview: The heist doesn't go as expected and the girls discover Miss Lucas's obsession. An unexpected reveal for Daniel and Evie leaves them reeling. Can Florian be trusted?

episodes.name: Enemies Within
episodes.overview: Miss Lucas is intent on proving to Jennie and Anika that nothing suspicious is happening at the Academy. Meanwhile, Jasmyn calls Oliver for help, and the Florian situation escalates beyond the Hunters’ control, reaching a chilling climax!
